text: Ndipo palibe chimene chimatiletsa Ife kutumiza zizindikiro kupatula kuti anthu a mvula zakale sadazikhulupirire izo. Ndipo kwa anthu a Thamoud, Ife tidawapatsa ngamira yaikazi kukhala chizindikiro chooneka ndi maso komabe iwo adaichitira zoipa. Ndipo Ife sititumiza zizindikiro kupatula ndi cholinga chofuna kuchenjeza ndi kuwachititsa mantha
